value.title: Man creates hilarious AI version of himself to take his spot during Zoom calls
value.excerpt: Well, sort of. Reed created an "AI Digital Twin" or a Zoombot if you will, and taught it speech recognition and text-to-speech conversation. The only problem is it's very clear the Zoombot is a bot.
